document_data.name: Mount Fussel
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Fussel''', which was also seen as '''Mount Fussell''', was a volcanic peak found within the [[Smoky Mountains]] of [[Unther]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Mount Fussel sat in the western region of the Smoky Mountains overlooking the [[Black Ash Plain]] to the southeast.
document_data.Inhabitants: A flock of [[dracolisk]]s were believed to live within the mountain. [[Salamander]]s swam in its magma.
